title: Does anyone else hate jhin adc.
body: I hate ezreal adc because of how useless they are but jhin is even more useless , if he misses his ult or goes against tanks he hardly does any damage in the time a dps champ like twitch or tristana or cait, etc just melts your team.

replies.body:
Did... I just hear that correctly? Jhin is useless?

Sounds like somebody had a bad game as him.

He's actually pretty good, atleast in my opinion - Sure, he has 5 skill shots in his kit, but I mean ¯\_(ツ)_/¯. Early game, as long as you rack up some kills early game, you'all be fine at mid and late game
didnt play jhin, played yasuo, carried pretty hard, as hard as i could actually, jhin just doesnt output the damage of a 2.50 a/second tristana dealing crits that are like 700 each.

and yet he wins the 1v1 /:   a warlords jhin if playing smart will can kill someone with an auto q auto. recovering a solid 700 hp with 1 warlords proc. he wins as long as he  doesnt waste the proc when hes full health

LoL calling jhin useless ?

It is because idiots play him full lethality.

Have u seen full crit jhin ? ... now that shit is broken as fuk against both tanks and squishies.

Getting 1 shotted with +1200 damage crit with just 1 auto that is not even his 4th shot is sure interactive gameplay indeed.

Jhin is not bad at all just not as strong as DPS ADs like Trist and twitch because of censor. But i still feel his damage output is good and he still hits hard but i guess it depends on what the build is.
Picking Jhin/Ezreal is borderline trolling right now. Even Caitlyn is on the weaker side of things at the moment and Lucian isn't good (as a bot Lane ADC) outside of counterpicks.

picking Ezreal ADC is borderline trolling right now.

Ezreal is like top tier jg right now.
sure , hes totes gonna own the yis, and the xin zhaos, and the warwicks and the kanes lul.

Nobody plays Yi or Kayn. Warwick is shat on by the introduction of so many Grevious Wounds items and he's outclassed by tanks.

The only person on that list he competes with is Kayn and he can clear very fast too. On top of that with Stormraider's his level 3 is actually fairly horrifying.
maybe if ur a high elo then no one plays kayne but every game I see kayne and jaravan in my bronzeness

Oh yeah we play Kayn and Jarvan but Warwick is pitiable to the likes of Sej and Maokai and Rammus (for some ungodly reason).
Add in Ahri and it is complete
I dont play jhin, I just hate having him because of how garbo he is.

sorry for my rudeness(actually), i got mad over ppl dissing my favorite adc.
but jhin is not garbage, he's not anywhere near good or ornn on release(garbage)
he's just one of those champs like Yasuo, your either jesus level or your a 7 year old flaming the enemy zed for killing him with "hacks"
You should check out movespeed Jhin, gotta go fast!
Yes. An adc who can't deal with tanks, joy.

"an adc who cant deal with tanks"
so every adc without armor pen and lethality?

they are both great champs ezreal is a little weaker in the early stages. I remember I played ezreal when I started league and all my friends told me he was a high skill curve, I accepted the challenge and fed every game. I went through so much toxic people telling me I was feeding AND GARBAGE but my friends backed me up. Those friends kept me going. Also, your support makes a HUGE difference. As for jhin I never really played him after reading his lore, but what from I can see he is a champ that seems solid.  You should buy more champs for various situation. its a lot of learning involved. It also helps the game grow. just remember it doesn't matter when anyone thinks except yourself.
for him he's mostly about positioning kinda like a sniper since that's what his ult is can't take down tanks with it but is good against high priority targets such as mid and adc
